mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attachfile(attachfileno, contentsno, fname, fupname, thumb, fsize, rdate) VALUES(attachfile_seq.nextval, #{contentsno}, #{fname}, #{fupname}, #{thumb}, #{fsize}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT attachfileno, contentsno, fname, fupname, thumb, fsize, rdate FROM attachfile ORDER BY contentsno DESC, attachfileno ASC
